body:
Test run results
----
```
OS                           Pass Pending Skipped Fail Total
--                           ---- ------- ------- ---- -----
CentOS Linux 7 (Core)        6049     343    1226   17  7635
Debian GNU/Linux 8 (jessie)  6066     342    1226    1  7635
Debian GNU/Linux 9 (stretch) 6066     342    1226    1  7635
openSUSE Leap 42.3           6066     341    1226    2  7635
Red Hat Enterprise Linux     6048     342    1226   19  7635
Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS           6066     342    1226    1  7635
Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS           6066     342    1226    1  7635
Ubuntu 17.04                 6066     342    1226    1  7635
```

Test failure analysis
----
- CentOS 7 and RHEL have the trouble with SSL protocol and `Invoke-WebRequest/Invoke-RestMethod`.
- Redhat is still failing the test for powershell exiting without hanging - this should be looked at more carefully in Jan
- OpenSUSE is failing an `invoke-item` test because 2 `ping` native commands are found, and the test should be improved to handle multiple binaries being found.
- The help tests should be improved to know when a browser is possible.
